game.name: Faith: The Unholy Trinity
game.desc: From the developer, Airdorf Games: \"FAITH is a pixel horror game inspired by the era of classic 8-bit gaming and the Satan Scare of the 1980s. Use your holy crucifix to perform exocirsms, fight back against possessed cultists, and cleanse haunted objects. Discover a world of dread, isolation, and mystery as you explore haunted forests, abandoned churches, and the inner sanctums of a Satanic cult.
